TopicTitle: How to stop RO from removing non RO parts?

Articles.Content: Is there any way to prevent Realism Overhaul from removing non-RO parts?

That's a strange thing to ask for. If you're using RO, odds are you're using either RSS or scaled up the stock system and in either case stock parts will be woefully underpowered and use propellants that RO doesn't really support. What parts in particular do you want to use but which RO is removing?

2 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

That's a strange thing to ask for. If you're using RO, odds are you're using either RSS or scaled up the stock system and in either case stock parts will be woefully underpowered and use propellants that RO doesn't really support. What parts in particular do you want to use but which RO is removing?

I am trying to use FarFutureTechnologies as i have RealExoplanets installed, and I want a way to get to the other solar systems.

On 8/28/2022 at 8:40 PM, TheSpaceRabbit said:

I am trying to use FarFutureTechnologies as i have RealExoplanets installed, and I want a way to get to the other solar systems.

try this. I think it will do what you want. Can't guarantee that there won't be unintended consequences. 

@PART[*]:HAS[~RSSROConfig]:AFTER[RealismOverhaul]
{
	%RSSROConfig = true
}
